Filter observed values by quantile.

Source: R/external_utilities.R
filter_values_by_quantile.Rd

Filter observed values by quantile.

filter_values_by_quantile(x, upper_quantile = 0.98)

Arguments

x

An input RNA/ATAC dataset where entries are indexeable by genomic coordinate: "chr", "from" and "to".
upper_quantile

The maximum quantile to determine cuts. If a value is above the quantile it is removed

Value

The input data with removed entries.

Examples

data('example_input')
filter_values_by_quantile(example_input$x_rna, upper_quantile = .98)

#> 
#> ── Upper quantile 0.98 
#> ℹ n = 16242 entries to remove
#> 
#> # A tibble: 16,242 x 8
#>    gene     cell       value chr        from        to   q_max del  
#>    <chr>    <chr>      <int> <chr>     <int>     <int>   <dbl> <lgl>
#>  1 M6PR     SRR5578183  7685 chr12   8940361   8949761  6741.  TRUE 
#>  2 KDM1A    SRR5578183 18970 chr1   23019443  23083689 11987.  TRUE 
#>  3 POLR2J   SRR5578183  3231 chr7  102473118 102478907  2991   TRUE 
#>  4 GCFC2    SRR5578183  3322 chr2   75652000  75710985  2989.  TRUE 
#>  5 ASB4     SRR5578183  2635 chr7   95478444  95540233  1496.  TRUE 
#>  6 OSBPL7   SRR5578183  6094 chr17  47807372  47821834  5679.  TRUE 
#>  7 CACNA2D2 SRR5578183    72 chr3   50362799  50504244    69.8 TRUE 
#>  8 SPAG9    SRR5578183 10838 chr17  50962174  51120868 10649.  TRUE 
#>  9 PKD1     SRR5578183  3499 chr16   2088708   2135898  2611.  TRUE 
#> 10 GIPR     SRR5578183   347 chr19  45668221  45683722   250.  TRUE 
#> # … with 16,232 more rows
#> Error: 
filter_values_by_quantile(example_input$x_atac, upper_quantile = .98)

#>
